required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy Testing of Collagen Peptide Drink
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy Testing of Collagen Peptide Drink

brief_summary.textblock: To assess Collagen Peptide Drink on skin condition improvement

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin wrinkles at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin wrinkles. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin texture at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin texture. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.measure: The change of skin collagen density
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin collagen density at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: DermaLab® Series SkinLab Combo was utilized to measure skin pores. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin elasticity at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Soft Plus was utilized to measure skin elasticity. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.measure: The change of MMP-1 of blood
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline MMP-1 at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure MMP-1

primary_outcome.measure: The change of TIMP-1 of blood
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline TIMP-1 at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure TIMP-1

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of skin melanin index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin melanin index at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Soft Plus was utilized to measure skin melanin index. Units: arbitrary units

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of skin L* value
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline L* value at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Chroma Meter MM500 was utilized to measure skin L* value. Units: arbitrary units, 0-100

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin spots at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin spots. Units: arbitrary units

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of skin UV spots
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin UV spots at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin UV spots. Units: arbitrary units

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of skin brown spots
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin brown spots at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin brown spots. Units: arbitrary units

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of TNF-α of blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline TNF-α at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure TNF-α

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of IL-10 of blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline IL-10 at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure IL-10

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of SOD-RBC of blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline SOD-RBC at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure SOD-RBC

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of f-thiols of blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline f-thiols at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure f-thiols

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of t-GSH of blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline t-GSH at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure t-GSH

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of GST-RBC of blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline GST-RBC at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure GST-RBC

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of MDA of blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline MDA at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure MDA

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin moisture at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Corneometer® CM825 was utilized to measure skin moisture. Units: arbitrary Corneometer® units 0-120

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of blood total antioxidant capacity (TAC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline TAC at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of TAC

other_outcome.measure: The change of total cholesterol of blood
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline total cholesterol at 4 weeks
other_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure total cholesterol

other_outcome.measure: The change of triglyceride of blood
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline triglyceride at 4 weeks
other_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure triglyceride

other_outcome.measure: The change of SGOT of blood
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline SGOT at 4 weeks
other_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure SGOT

other_outcome.measure: The change of SGPT of blood
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline SGPT at 4 weeks
other_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure SGPT

other_outcome.measure: The change of BUN of blood
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline BUN at 4 weeks
other_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure BUN

other_outcome.measure: The change of creatinine of blood
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline creatinine at 4 weeks
other_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure creatinine

other_outcome.measure: The change of uric acid of blood
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline uric acid at 4 weeks
other_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure uric acid

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy adults aged above 20 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject who is not willing to participate in this study.
- Patients with diseases of the skin, liver, kidney.
- Subjects who have known cosmetic, drug or food allergies, difficulty in digestive tract absorption or disorder.
- Female who is pregnant or nursing or planning to become pregnant during the course of the study.
- Received facial laser therapy, chemical peeling or UV overexposure in the past 4 weeks.
- Constant drug use
- Participated cosmetic product human study in the past 3 months.
